text: Ne balia bachinganga indebe(arsh) nende	balia	bamubotokhana bamwitsoominjia nibahelesia Nyasaye wabu oluyali , nebamusuubilanga ne basabilanga eshileshelo balia basuubila: â€œ Nyasaye wefu Omulesi waswania buli eshindu tsimbabaasi nende obumanyi kho baleshele balia abasaba eshileshelo mana nibaloonda injila yiyio, ne obekalile eshinyasio shio mulilo
